attributes.action: Stop Blue Badge holders from being charged twice for parking
attributes.additional_details:
Disabled people will be the only part of society that will have to pay twice for parking.

How Blue Badge holders will be charged twice:
1.  Councils have increased the cost of issuing a blue badge by 500%.
2.  With effect from April 2012 councils will start charging Blue Badge holders to park in disabled bays.

Please help stop this by signing this petition.

Thank you.
